response.summary:
I am a bilingual engineer (B2) with a Master in Analytics, pursuing a Master in Economics, with extensive experience in leadership of business intelligence teams, developing data flows from processing, visualization, training of machine learning models and generation of business  insights from which I generate recommendations to guide the decision making process in order to add value to companies. I master tools such as Python, R, Stata, Tableau, Power BI, Excel, GCP, SQL, Matillion(ETL), and Agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban

I am interested in continuing to develop myself in leadership roles such as Business Intelligence Consultant, Analytics Manager, Head of Data, Chief Data Officer.
response.skills: Business Intelligence (BI), Business Strategy, Data Analytics, Data Visualization, Econometrics, Economics of Education, Problem Solving, Data Governance, Data Engineering, Cloud Computing, Requirements Gathering, SQL, Leadership, Gestión de proyectos, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Analysis, Project Management, Statistics, Estadística

profile_positions.title: Data Analysis Teacher -  Program "Todos a la U"

profile_positions.description:
Responsabilidades
- Desarrollar la estrategia de datos con el fin de alinear llos casos de uso de analítica aplicada  con las necesidades de la organización, asi como la definición de las politicas de gobierno de datos.
- Liderar el equipo de datos y dar seguimiento al cumplimiento KPIs
- Gestionar la implementación del datawarehouse en Bigquery, asi como los procesos de ETL asociados.
- Guiar la implementación del ecosistema de dashboards educación, finanzas y comercial.
- Desarrollar el modelo de predicción de la deserción de estudiantes.

Logros: 
- Lideré la implementación del sistema de asistencias automatizado, el cual pasó de ser un proceso manual que tomaba 1 horas por sede a un flujo automátizado,  centralizado de 15 minutos más la generación de alertas de inasistencias consecutivas y acumuladas por estudiante.
- Gestioné la implementación de los procesos de aseguramiento de calidad de datos. Inicialmente era un proceso manual en excel el cual tomaba 2 horas y fue mejorado a un proceso automático de 10 minutos basados consultas programadas de Bigquery  y visualizaciones en Power BI. Disminuyendo  los tiempo de identificació de inconsistencias en terminos de semanas a días.
- Diseñé un proceso de análisis de motivos de retiro con NLP en el cual se confirmaron las 3 categorias de mayor impacto en retiros de estudiantes.
profile_positions.title: Chief Data Officer

profile_positions.description:
I ensured data monetization in the Telecommunications Sector by identifying and exploiting new
products based on analytical tools. I strengthened existing products through data governance
strategies and cloud solutions. Additionally, I provided support and assistance to commercial areas
in crafting use cases and commercial offers tailored to B2B clients.
Achievement: I got two promotions in 3 years. Also, automation of product "Luca Consumo" on
Pentaho, Developed a Digital client Model, automated the risk model calibration and backtesting
process
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist - Bigdata and Analytics consultant B2B - Level 12

profile_positions.description: Solve new challenges for the organization through machine learning models. Develop customer segmentation models that allow the prioritization of services and risk optimization to qualify new fixed and mobile customers. Development of a segmentation model for the identification of digital clients, which is an input for digital campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist Senior -  Level 11

profile_positions.description: Design and maintenance of automatic information generation of reports based on ETL processes and machine learning models and dashboards that answer the business questions of the marketing departments, income assurance, among others,  through tools like Pentaho, bigdata (hive, spark), Teradata, and tableau.
profile_positions.title: Data management professional -  Level 10

profile_positions.description: To Update the customer segmentation model and allocation of the sales force. Development of new inputs for decision-making. Generate reports of opportunities, imports. Develop new information generation strategies, data quality assurance.
profile_positions.title: Datamining Specialist

profile_positions.description: Manage the SICOMPITE platform to ensure functionality to internal and external users of the camera. Carry out tests of new developments and survey of use cases for the implementation of new functionalities and control of incidents of the platform, establish the quality of the information in the reports and create new proposals for their optimization.
profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence Professional

company.name: Unidad para la atención y reparación integral de victimas

profile_positions.company: Unidad para la atención y reparación integral de victimas
profile_positions.description:
Define analysis processes to optimize the use of information from entities belonging to the National Information Network that allow ensuring the quality of information, characterization, targeting, prioritization of the victim population, and provide technical and conceptual support in the processes for measuring the effective enjoyment of rights, minimum subsistence and overcoming the situation of vulnerability.

Achievements: developed a database cataloging model and coordinated the implementation of a database reporting system that allowed structuring and storing new inputs, their usefulness, which allowed ensuring the quality of the dictionaries and learning about beforehand utility (to which right and component it impacts) of each one of the databases.
profile_positions.title: Contractor - Analytics professional

profile_positions.description: Managed the Salesforce platform to provide real-time information to the commercial vice presidency regarding policy payment performance and new business ventures. Gathered requirements from other departments for process automation within Salesforce. Streamlined organizational processes and conducted user training on the platform. Designed control panels for data-driven decision-making
profile_positions.title: Salesforce Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Coordinated the migration of the previous database to Salesforce and determined the developer's work plan for a successful implementation. Assisted in sales processes and served foreign clients. Identified organizational processes for automation through the platform, created usage manuals, and designed management reports on brand and patent performance.
Achievement: Redesigned the factor format and implemented an automated quotation system on Salesforce with developer support, resulting in a 50% reduction in quotation generation time
profile_positions.title: Process Improvement Assistant
